name: MIS ROR and RDR Uptake Report
description:
Has multiple tabs to display which Prisoners have completed a Resettlement Day Release, a Resettlement Overnight Release and any other RoTL. This report has been created to assist Establishments looking for those Prisoners who have not yet been released on ROR for Parole purposes.
MOV0074 v00.00.01 Last Updated 19/02/20

dataset.name: All Prisoners
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.FIRST_NAME, CASE WHEN AT_DOB.DAY_DATE < '31/12/9000' THEN AT_DOB.DAY_DATE END AS DATE_OF_BIRTH, CASE WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE = 'MERGE' THEN 'Code Missing' WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE IS NULL THEN 'Code Missing' WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE = 'W8' THEN 'W3' WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE = 'O1' THEN 'A4' ELSE AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE END AS ETHNIC_CODE, CASE WHEN AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LEGAL_STATUS_BAND = '1' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS IS_INDETERMINATE_SENTENCE_, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.MAIN_LEGAL_STATUS_DESCRIPTION, DT_ADMISSION.MOVEMENT_TIME, AT_FACT_MOV_EXT.MOVEMENT_SEQ FROM (SELECT ob.offender_id_display, fme.offender_booking_sk, est.establishment_code_nk, fme.to_location_sk, fme.from_location_sk, fme.from_location_type, MAX(fme.MOVEMENT_SEQ) AS MOVEMENT_SEQ, MAX(d.day_date) AS MOVEMENT_TIME, TRUNC(ETL.LOAD_END_DATETIME) AS LOAD_DATE FROM BODIMIS.FACT_MOVEMENT_EXTERNAL fme, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING ob, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT est, BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG ETL, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE d WHERE ob.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = est.ESTABLISHMENT_SK AND d.date_sk = fme.date_sk AND fme.offender_booking_sk = ob.offender_booking_sk AND ob.active_status IN ('Active In', 'Active Out') AND ob.MIS_CURRENT_RECORD_IND = 'Y' AND ob.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y' AND ETL.LOAD_ID = (SELECT MAX(LOAD_ID) FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE NOT LOAD_END_DATETIME IS NULL) AND ob.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = fme.to_location_sk AND fme.movement_seq = (SELECT MAX(fme2.movement_seq) FROM BODIMIS.FACT_MOVEMENT_EXTERNAL fme2 WHERE fme.offender_booking_sk = fme2.offender_booking_sk AND fme2.direction_code = 'IN' AND fme2.TYPE = 'Admission' AND fme2.To_location_type = 'Establishment' AND fme2.reason_code <> 'R') GROUP BY ob.offender_id_display, fme.offender_booking_sk, est.establishment_code_nk, fme.to_location_sk, fme.from_location_sk, fme.from_location_type, ETL.LOAD_END_DATETIME) DT_ADMISSION, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT, BODIMIS.DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_DOB, BODIMIS.FACT_MOVEMENT_EXTERNAL AT_FACT_MOV_EXT, BODIMIS.DIM_CELL AT_CELL WHERE (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.BIRTH_DATE_SK = AT_DOB.DATE_SK) AND (AT_CELL.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_FACT_MOV_EXT.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK) AND (AT_CELL.UNIT_4_SK = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ETHNICITY_CODE) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK = DT_ADMISSION.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK (+)) AND ((AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK = (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_)))), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, SURNAME, FIRST_NAME, DATE_OF_BIRTH, ETHNIC_CODE, IS_INDETERMINATE_SENTENCE_, MAIN_LEGAL_STATUS_DESCRIPTION, MOVEMENT_TIME, MOVEMENT_SEQ, CASE WHEN V_COUNT_POM > 1 THEN 'MULTIPLE - Please check record' ELSE V_POM END AS V_POM_DISPLAY, ALL_PRISONERS.MAIN_LEGAL_STATUS_DESCRIPTION AS V_MAIN_LEGAL_STATUS, IS_INDETERMINATE_SENTENCE_ AS V_INDETERMINATE_SENT_, MOVEMENT_TIME AS V_ADMISSION_DATE, ROR_AND_RDR.CURR_ROTL_DATE AS V_ROTL_ELIGIBILITY_DATE, MAX(V_MOVEMENT_DESCRIPTION_ALL) OVER (PARTITION BY V_MOVEMENT_DATE_ALL = V_MAX_ROTL_ALL) AS V_MAX_MOVEMENT_DESCRIPTION_ALL, CASE WHEN V_MAX_MOVEMENT_DESCRIPTION IS NULL THEN 'No' ELSE 'Yes' END AS V_ROR_AND_RDR_ FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: ROR and RDR
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.FIRST_NAME, CASE WHEN AT_DOB.DAY_DATE < '31/12/9000' THEN AT_DOB.DAY_DATE END AS DATE_OF_BIRTH, CASE WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE = 'MERGE' THEN 'Code Missing' WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE IS NULL THEN 'Code Missing' WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE = 'W8' THEN 'W3' WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE = 'O1' THEN 'A4' ELSE AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE END AS ETHNIC_CODE, AT_FACT_MOV_EXT.REASON, AT_DIM_DATE_EXT_MOV.DAY_DATE, AT_ESTABLISHMENT_EXT_MOV_FROM.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK, SUBSTR(AT_FACT_MOV_EXT.MOVEMENT_TIME, 11, 6) AS MOVEMENT_TIME, FACT_CURR_KEY_DATES_SENT.CURR_ROTL_DATE, AT_FACT_MOV_EXT.MOVEMENT_TIME, AT_FACT_MOV_EXT.DIRECTION_CODE, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.MAIN_LEGAL_STATUS_DESCRIPTION, AT_FACT_MOV_EXT.MOVEMENT_SEQ FROM BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT, BODIMIS.DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_DOB, BODIMIS.FACT_MOVEMENT_EXTERNAL AT_FACT_MOV_EXT, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_DIM_DATE_EXT_MOV, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT_EXT_MOV_FROM, FACT_CURR_KEY_DATES_SENT, BODIMIS.DIM_CELL AT_CELL WHERE (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK = FACT_CURR_KEY_DATES_SENT.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK (+)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.BIRTH_DATE_SK = AT_DOB.DATE_SK) AND (AT_CELL.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_FACT_MOV_EXT.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK) AND (AT_DIM_DATE_EXT_MOV.DATE_SK = AT_FACT_MOV_EXT.DATE_SK) AND (CASE WHEN AT_FACT_MOV_EXT.FROM_LOCATION_TYPE = 'Establishment' THEN AT_FACT_MOV_EXT.FROM_LOCATION_SK END = AT_ESTABLISHMENT_EXT_MOV_FROM.ESTABLISHMENT_SK (+)) AND (AT_CELL.UNIT_4_SK = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ETHNICITY_CODE) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND ((AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK = (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND AT_FACT_MOV_EXT.TYPE IN ('Temporary Absence / Home Leave', 'Temporary Absence') AND NOT AT_FACT_MOV_EXT.REASON IN ('Medical', 'Medical or Dental Appointments', 'Medical/Dental Inpatient Appointment', 'Medical/Dental Outpatient Appointment', 'End of Custody Licence (ECL)', 'Recall from End of Custody Licence (ECL)', 'Final Discharge To Hospital-Psychiatric', 'Awaiting Removal to Psychiatric Hospital', 'Hospital/Hospice In-Patient', 'Outside Hospital Attendance', 'Court Appearance - Police Product Order', 'Court/Legal/Police/Prison Transfer', 'Discharged into Police Custody', 'Helping Police With Enquiries', 'Police Production', 'Video Link Police Production'))), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, SURNAME, FIRST_NAME, DATE_OF_BIRTH, ETHNIC_CODE, REASON, DAY_DATE, ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK, MOVEMENT_TIME, CURR_ROTL_DATE, MOVEMENT_TIME, DIRECTION_CODE, MAIN_LEGAL_STATUS_DESCRIPTION, MOVEMENT_SEQ, CASE WHEN V_COUNT_POM > 1 THEN 'MULTIPLE - Please check record' ELSE V_POM END AS V_POM_DISPLAY, IS_INDETERMINATE_SENTENCE_ AS V_INDETERMINATE_SENT_, MOVEMENT_TIME AS V_ADMISSION_DATE, ROR_AND_RDR.CURR_ROTL_DATE AS V_ROTL_ELIGIBILITY_DATE, 'TBD' AS V_MAX_MOVEMENT_DESCRIPTION_, 'TBD' AS V_MAX_MOVEMENT_DESCRIPTION, (TO_DATE(V_MAX_RORRDR_OUT, 'DD/MM/YYYY') - TO_DATE(V_MAX_RORRDR_IN, 'DD/MM/YYYY')) || 1 AS V_DAYS_ON_RORRDR, 'TBD' AS V_ROR_IN_NOMS, CASE WHEN V_MOVE_IN_OUT = 0 THEN 'Please check record, possible date error / transfer from RoTL or currently out on RoTL' END AS V_DATA_ERRORS FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: POM
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.FIRST_NAME, CASE WHEN AT_DOB.DAY_DATE < '31/12/9000' THEN AT_DOB.DAY_DATE END AS DATE_OF_BIRTH, CASE WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE = 'MERGE' THEN 'Code Missing' WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE IS NULL THEN 'Code Missing' WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE = 'W8' THEN 'W3' WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE = 'O1' THEN 'A4' ELSE AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE END AS ETHNIC_CODE, TRIM(CASE WHEN NOT DT_OFFENDER_CONTACT_ADDRESS.TITLE IS NULL THEN DT_OFFENDER_CONTACT_ADDRESS.TITLE || ' ' END || CASE WHEN NOT DT_OFFENDER_CONTACT_ADDRESS.FIRST_NAME IS NULL THEN DT_OFFENDER_CONTACT_ADDRESS.FIRST_NAME || ' ' END || CASE WHEN NOT DT_OFFENDER_CONTACT_ADDRESS.MIDDLE_NAME IS NULL THEN DT_OFFENDER_CONTACT_ADDRESS.MIDDLE_NAME || ' ' END || DT_OFFENDER_CONTACT_ADDRESS.LAST_NAME) AS OTHER_CONTACT_NAME FROM BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT, BODIMIS.DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_DOB, (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY dooc.offender_booking_sk, dooc.relationship ORDER BY dooc.active_flag DESC, dooc.address_flag DESC, dooc.mis_load_id DESC) AS row_seq_filter, dooc.*, CASE WHEN dooc.next_of_kin_flag = 'Y' THEN 'NEXTOFKIN' ELSE 'CONTACT' END AS Con_Addr_Type, CASE WHEN dooc.next_of_kin_flag = 'Y' THEN 'Next of Kin' ELSE 'Contact' END AS ConAddrTypeDesc FROM bodimis.dim_offender_other_contacts dooc) DT_OFFENDER_CONTACT_ADDRESS, BODIMIS.DIM_CELL AT_CELL WHERE (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.BIRTH_DATE_SK = AT_DOB.DATE_SK) AND (AT_CELL.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_CELL.UNIT_4_SK = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ETHNICITY_CODE) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK = DT_OFFENDER_CONTACT_ADDRESS.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK (+)) AND (DT_OFFENDER_CONTACT_ADDRESS.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IS NULL OR DT_OFFENDER_CONTACT_ADDRESS.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (DT_OFFENDER_CONTACT_ADDRESS.RELATIONSHIP = 'Prison Offender Manager' AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK = (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (DT_OFFENDER_CONTACT_ADDRESS.ACTIVE_FLAG (+) = 'Y'))), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, SURNAME, FIRST_NAME, DATE_OF_BIRTH, ETHNIC_CODE, OTHER_CONTACT_NAME FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: All ROTL
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.FIRST_NAME, CASE WHEN AT_DOB.DAY_DATE < '31/12/9000' THEN AT_DOB.DAY_DATE END AS DATE_OF_BIRTH, CASE WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE = 'MERGE' THEN 'Code Missing' WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE IS NULL THEN 'Code Missing' WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE = 'W8' THEN 'W3' WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE = 'O1' THEN 'A4' ELSE AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE END AS ETHNIC_CODE, AT_FACT_MOV_EXT.REASON, AT_DIM_DATE_EXT_MOV.DAY_DATE, AT_ESTABLISHMENT_EXT_MOV_FROM.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK, SUBSTR(AT_FACT_MOV_EXT.MOVEMENT_TIME, 11, 6) AS MOVEMENT_TIME, FACT_CURR_KEY_DATES_SENT.CURR_ROTL_DATE, AT_FACT_MOV_EXT.MOVEMENT_TIME, AT_FACT_MOV_EXT.DIRECTION_CODE, AT_FACT_MOV_EXT.MOVEMENT_SEQ FROM BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT, BODIMIS.DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_DOB, BODIMIS.FACT_MOVEMENT_EXTERNAL AT_FACT_MOV_EXT, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_DIM_DATE_EXT_MOV, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT_EXT_MOV_FROM, FACT_CURR_KEY_DATES_SENT, BODIMIS.DIM_CELL AT_CELL WHERE (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK = FACT_CURR_KEY_DATES_SENT.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK (+)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.BIRTH_DATE_SK = AT_DOB.DATE_SK) AND (AT_CELL.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_FACT_MOV_EXT.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK) AND (AT_DIM_DATE_EXT_MOV.DATE_SK = AT_FACT_MOV_EXT.DATE_SK) AND (CASE WHEN AT_FACT_MOV_EXT.FROM_LOCATION_TYPE = 'Establishment' THEN AT_FACT_MOV_EXT.FROM_LOCATION_SK END = AT_ESTABLISHMENT_EXT_MOV_FROM.ESTABLISHMENT_SK (+)) AND (AT_CELL.UNIT_4_SK = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ETHNICITY_CODE) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND ((AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK = (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND AT_FACT_MOV_EXT.TYPE IN ('Temporary Absence / Home Leave', 'Temporary Absence'))), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, SURNAME, FIRST_NAME, DATE_OF_BIRTH, ETHNIC_CODE, REASON, DAY_DATE, ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK, MOVEMENT_TIME, CURR_ROTL_DATE, MOVEMENT_TIME, DIRECTION_CODE, MOVEMENT_SEQ FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: MIS Load Date
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.BUSINESS_DATE FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE (BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.LOAD_ID = (SELECT MAX(LOAD_ID) FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE NOT LOAD_END_DATETIME IS NULL))), dataset_ AS (SELECT BUSINESS_DATE FROM dataset_base_)

filter.name: prefilter_
filter.query: prefilter_ AS (SELECT * FROM dataset_ WHERE (ROR_AND_RDR_MOVEMENT_DESCRIP33 NOT(IN ('Medical','Medical/Dental Inpatient Appointment','Medical/Dental Outpatient Appointment','Medical or Dental Appointments','Court Appearance - Police Product Order','Court/Legal/Police/Prison Transfer','Discharged into Police Custody','Helping Police With Enquiries','Police Production','Video Link Police Production','Awaiting Removal to Psychiatric Hospital','Final Discharge To Hospital-Psychiatric','Hospital/Hospice In-Patient','Outside Hospital Attendance','Funeral','Funerals And Deaths','Other Security Escort','End of Custody Licence (ECL)')) AND ROR_AND_RDR_MOVEMENT_DIRECTI36 = 'OUT'))

field.name: $ref:V_MAX_MOVE_DATE
field.legacySql: =Max([ROR and RDR].[Movement Date and Time (External)]) In([ROR and RDR].[NOMS Number])

field.name: $ref:V_MAX_MOVEMENT_DESCRIPTION_
field.legacySql: =Max([ROR and RDR].[Movement Description (External)]) Where ([ROR and RDR].[Movement Date and Time (External)] = [v_Max_Move_Date]) In ([ROR and RDR].[NOMS Number])

filter.name: prefilter_
filter.query: prefilter_ AS (SELECT * FROM dataset_ WHERE ROR_AND_RDR_MOVEMENT_DESCRIP33 NOT(IN ('Medical','Medical/Dental Inpatient Appointment','Medical/Dental Outpatient Appointment','Medical or Dental Appointments','Court Appearance - Police Product Order','Court/Legal/Police/Prison Transfer','Discharged into Police Custody','Helping Police With Enquiries','Police Production','Video Link Police Production','Awaiting Removal to Psychiatric Hospital','Final Discharge To Hospital-Psychiatric','Hospital/Hospice In-Patient','Outside Hospital Attendance','Funeral','Funerals And Deaths','Other Security Escort','End of Custody Licence (ECL)')))

field.name: $ref:V_MAX_MOVE_DATE
field.legacySql: =Max([ROR and RDR].[Movement Date and Time (External)]) In([ROR and RDR].[NOMS Number])

field.name: $ref:V_MAX_MOVEMENT_DESCRIPTION_
field.legacySql: =Max([ROR and RDR].[Movement Description (External)]) Where ([ROR and RDR].[Movement Date and Time (External)] = [v_Max_Move_Date]) In ([ROR and RDR].[NOMS Number])

filter.name: prefilter_
filter.query: prefilter_ AS (SELECT * FROM dataset_ WHERE V_ROR_IN_NOMS = 'No')

field.name: $ref:V_MAX_ROTL_ALL
field.legacySql: =Max([All ROTL].[Movement Date and Time (External)]) In ([NOMS Number])

filter.name: prefilter_
filter.query: prefilter_ AS (SELECT * FROM dataset_ WHERE V_MOVEMENT_DATE_ALL IS NULL)

report.name: Time on last ROR or RDR

filter.name: prefilter_
filter.query: prefilter_ AS (SELECT * FROM dataset_ WHERE (V_MAX_MOVEMENT_DESCRIPTION NOT(IN ('Medical','Medical/Dental Inpatient Appointment','Medical/Dental Outpatient Appointment','Medical or Dental Appointments','Court Appearance - Police Product Order','Court/Legal/Police/Prison Transfer','Discharged into Police Custody','Helping Police With Enquiries','Police Production','Video Link Police Production','Awaiting Removal to Psychiatric Hospital','Final Discharge To Hospital-Psychiatric','Hospital/Hospice In-Patient','Outside Hospital Attendance','Funeral','Funerals And Deaths','Other Security Escort','End of Custody Licence (ECL)')) AND ROR_AND_RDR_MOVEMENT_DESCRIP33 NOT(IN ('Medical','Medical/Dental Inpatient Appointment','Medical/Dental Outpatient Appointment','Medical or Dental Appointments','Court Appearance - Police Product Order','Court/Legal/Police/Prison Transfer','Discharged into Police Custody','Helping Police With Enquiries','Police Production','Video Link Police Production','Awaiting Removal to Psychiatric Hospital','Final Discharge To Hospital-Psychiatric','Hospital/Hospice In-Patient','Outside Hospital Attendance','Funeral','Funerals And Deaths','Other Security Escort','End of Custody Licence (ECL)'))))

field.name: $ref:V_DATA_ERRORS
field.legacySql: =If ([v_Move_IN_>OUT] = 0; "Please check record, possible date error / transfer from RoTL or currently out on RoTL")

report.name: All Prisoners and ROR or RDR
